column5: Just bought the Garmin E-Trex.  Going to see if its any better than my Magellan.  I found this excellent Video, which will help to get started. http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-3774968911404690784
That is a great model for the price considering it is discountinued.

My Discontinued Magellan has lasted me six years and still going on strong.  Used it in the Army and lots of Bushwacking.  The only thing I hate about it, is, it used up too much battery Power.  Hopefully the E-Trex is not as bad.
I think you will be pleased, Holdfast.  Let us know what you think, that is an incredible deal.
After one year, I'm on my second set of batteries.  Nice little GPS, works well.
